description_en:
Discover ultimate beauty with **Maybelline Lifter Liner**, the revolutionary lip liner from Maybelline New York. Formulated with Hyaluronic acid, this lip pencil delivers a super smooth feelâ€”no tuggingâ€”making lip definition a delightful experience. It features long-lasting, transfer-proof creamy color and a sharpenable fine tip for ultra-precise, smooth lines that enhance your natural lip beauty. **Maybelline Lifter Liner** is available in 8 versatile shades, allowing you to create endless looks and easily pair it with your favorite lip gloss like "Lifter Gloss". Achieve perfect lips in just two simple steps: line your lips with **Maybelline Lifter Liner** and then add shine for full, captivating lips.

â­ Fully vegan formula for conscious beauty.
â­ Long-lasting to keep up with your busy day.
â­ Transfer-proof to maintain your flawless look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lifter Liner**
â­ Outline your lips with the pencil.
â­ Use the precise tip to fill in or perfectly define the cupid's bow.
â­ For best results, apply before lipstick or lip gloss.
â­ Product not to be used to line the inner lips.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lifter Liner**
â­ Hyaluronic Acid for hydrated, smooth lips.
â­ Creamy ingredients ensure smooth color payoff.
â­ Vegan formula.

description_en:
Meet the game-changing **Maybelline Lifter Liner**, your new go-to lip liner from Maybelline New York.

Infused with Hyaluronic Acid, **Maybelline Lifter Liner** glides on smoothly for a comfortable, no-tug feel, creating a fuller-looking pout.

â­ Features creamy, long-lasting color that's transfer-proof.
â­ A sharpenable tip delivers ultra-precise lines and a seamless glide.
â­ Enjoy a vegan formula for comfortable all-day wear.
â­ Available in 8 stunning shades to create endless combos with your favorite Lifter Gloss.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lifter Liner**:
â­ Precisely line your lips before applying lipstick or lip gloss.
â­ For the perfect pout, pair with Lifter Gloss.
â­ Product not to be used to line the inner lips.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lifter Liner**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid for added hydration and smoothness.
â­ Vegan Formula.

description_en:
Introducing **Maybelline Lifter Liner**, Maybelline New York's revolutionary lip liner designed for your perfect pout. Formulated with Hyaluronic acid, this lip pencil delivers a super smooth feelâ€”no tug, just pure comfort. It glides on effortlessly with its creamy, long-lasting color. The ultra-precise, sharpenable tip allows for perfectly defined, smooth lines, making it your go-to for shaping and enhancing your lips. **Maybelline Lifter Liner** is available in 8 shades, offering endless combo possibilities to perfectly complement your favorite Lifter Gloss. Achieve the ultimate Lifter Lip in just two simple steps: line with **Maybelline Lifter Liner** and shine with Lifter Gloss for a fuller, more captivating look that lasts.

â­ Vegan Formula for a guilt-free, vibrant lip look.
â­ Long Lasting wear ensures your lip color stays put all day.
â­ Transfer Proof to keep your lips looking flawless without smudging.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lifter Liner**
â­ Start by precisely outlining the natural shape of your lips.
â­ You can also use it to fill in your lips for a smooth base for lipstick.
â­ Gently blend the color with your fingertip for a softer effect.
â­ For the best results, pair it with Maybelline's Lifter Gloss.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lifter Liner**
â­ Hyaluronic Acid for hydrating and smoothing the lips.
â­ Creamy formula for a smooth, effortless application.
â­ Highly pigmented shades for long-lasting color payoff.

description_en:
Experience the transformation with **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless 110**, perfect for a long-lasting, natural matte complexion. Its upgraded formula offers up to 16-hour oil control and includes SPF22 sun protection, giving you a flawless, shine-free finish with visibly refined pores. **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless 110** is specifically designed for normal to oily skin, featuring micro-fine powders that absorb excess oil and blur imperfections for a smooth, natural-looking complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless 110**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to your skin after primer to ensure a perfect, even skin tone.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless 110**:
â­ Advanced formula with SPF22.
â­ Micro-fine powders to absorb oil and reduce skin shine.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients to maintain skin softness.
â­ Free from artificial fragrances.
â­ Medium to full buildable coverage.
â­ Available in 24 tone-fitting shades.

description_en:
The **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless** powder foundation is a 12-hour oil-control powder foundation that blends into skin for an all-day mattifying look and feel. This powder foundation will give you a flawless natural matte look and is perfect for hot weather. With SPF 28.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless**:
â­ Apply powder to face using the sponge or a brush in a downward motion to avoid making fine hairs more visible.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless**:
â­ 12-hour oil-control powder foundation.
â­ Provides an all-day mattifying look and feel.
â­ Gives a flawless natural matte look.
â­ Perfect for hot weather.
â­ With SPF 28.

Caution & Warnings:
â­ For external use only.
â­ Keep out of reach from children.
â­ Store in a cool dry place, away from sunlight.
â­ In case of an allergic reaction on the skin, discontinue use.
â­ Consult a dermatologist if rashes appear on your skin.

description_en:
Ink your lips with attitude in Maybelline New York's SuperStay Matte Ink liquid lipstick in the vibrant Spiced-Up shade. Experience intense ink color concentration and an ultra-chic matte finish that lasts for an incredible 16 hours, ensuring a flawless look without transfer or fading. The precise arrow applicator allows for effortless application and sharp definition, delivering a second-skin, matte effect in just one stroke for statement, inked lips that last.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **SuperStay Matte Ink 325 Spiced-Up**:
â­ Apply this lipstick to the center of your upper lip and follow the contours of your mouth for precise definition.
â­ Glide the lipstick across the entire bottom lip for complete, even coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **SuperStay Matte Ink 325 Spiced-Up**:
â­ Intense ink color concentration
â­ Ultra-chic matte finish
â­ Flawless 16-hour wear
â­ Precise arrow applicator for perfect shaping
â­ Second-skin, matte effect

title_ar: Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ¨ÙŠÙ„ÙŠÙ† Ù†ÙŠÙˆÙŠÙˆØ±Ùƒ Ø³ÙˆØ¨Ø± Ø³ØªØ§ÙŠ Ù…Ø§Øª Ø¥Ù†Ùƒ 50 ÙÙˆÙŠØ§Ø¬Ø± - Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ ØºÙŠØ± Ù„Ø§Ù…Ø¹ ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Introducing the **Maybelline New York SuperStay Matte Ink 50 Voyager**, a long-lasting liquid lipstick that delivers a flawless matte finish in a range of super-pigmented shades, perfect for every occasion. This waterproof formula is designed to stay put all day, no matter how many bites, sips, or kisses you throw its way. Ink your lips in gorgeous, matte lip color with the **Maybelline New York SuperStay Matte Ink 50 Voyager**. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York SuperStay Matte Ink 50 Voyager**:
â­ Choose your shade.
â­ Get precise application by tracing your cupidâ€™s bow with the applicator.
â­ Mirror this application on the other half of the top lip, shading in evenly.
â­ As you get closer to the lip contours, use the tip of the precision applicator for controlled application along the lip edge.
â­ Let it sit for a few minutes to dry matte for ultimate matte perfection. Enjoy high-intensity color and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York SuperStay Matte Ink 50 Voyager**:
â­ Richly pigmented creamy liquid formula.
â­ Unique arrow applicator for precise application.
â­ Lasts up to 16 hours with a matte finish.
â­ Available in a range of super saturated shades.

#Maybelline #Lipstick #SaudiMakeup #MatteLips #KSABeauty #MaybellineNY #SaudiArabia #LipColor #LongLastingLipstick #BeautyKSA

title_en: Maybelline Sun Kisser Liquid Blush - 11 Electric Bronze
title_ar: Ù…ÙŠØ¨ÙŠÙ„ÙŠÙ† Ø³Ù† ÙƒÙŠØ³Ø± Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± Ø®Ø¯ÙˆØ¯ Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ - 11 Ø¥Ù„ÙƒØªØ±ÙŠÙƒ Ø¨Ø±ÙˆÙ†Ø²ÙŠ
description_en:
Grant your complexion a sun-kissed flush of colour with the **Maybelline Sun Kisser Liquid Blush**. Infused with vitamin E and melt-to-skin pigments, the liquid blush effortlessly blends into the skin to deliver buildable, glowing colour that catches the light at every angle. The convenient doe-foot applicator allows for easy and controlled application â€“ simply dot, dot and blend. Whether elevating your no-makeup makeup look or experimenting with the sunset blush trend, the glowy liquid formula is available in five shades to bronze, add colour and highlight. Vegan.

**Product Features:**
â­ Buildable colour for a natural flush of radiance.
â­ Long-lasting formula with a smooth, flawless finish.
â­ Easy to apply and blend for a seamless, perfected look.
â­ Melt-to-skin, non-stick formula for comfortable wear.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Sun Kisser Liquid Blush**:
â­ Using plush dot applicator, apply product to face.
â­ Build and blend as desired.
â­ Dot, blend a single shade to get a glowy, natural look.
â­ Build with other shades to create dimension and a more intense look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Sun Kisser Liquid Blush**:
â­ Aqua / Water, Dimethicone, Isododecane, Alcohol Denat., Butylene Glycol, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Perlite, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Nylon-12, Isopropyl Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Bis-Peg/Ppg-14/14 Dimethicone, Magnesium Sulfate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Phenoxyethanol, Silica Silylate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Dipentaerythrityl Tetrahydroxystearate/Tetraisostearate, Tocopherol, Triethoxysilylethyl Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Glycerin, Empetrum Nigrum Fruit Juice, Silica, Tin Oxide, Potassium Sorbate, [+/- May Contain Mica, Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 / Iron Oxides, Ci 19140 / Yellow 5 Lake, Ci 15850 / Red 7, Ci 77007 / Ultramarines.

#Maybelline #Blush #LiquidBlush #FaceMakeup #Beauty #SunKissedGlow #NaturalMakeup #Cosmetics #SaudiArabia #Skincare

title_ar: Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ¨ÙŠÙ„ÙŠÙ† ÙƒÙˆÙ†Ø³ÙŠÙ„Ø± Ø§Ù†Ø³ØªÙ†Øª Ø§ÙŠØ¬ Ø±ÙŠÙˆØ§ÙŠÙ†Ø¯ ÙÙŠÙŠØ± 03: ØªØºØ·ÙŠØ© ÙˆØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Discover **Maybelline Concealer Instant Age Rewind Fair 03**, the ultimate do-it-all concealer that hydrates, corrects, and conceals in a click! This multi-use concealer is vegan, non-comedogenic, and formulated without mineral oil, parabens, or talc, making it gentle on the skin. Enjoy up to 12 hours of moisturizing wear for crease-resistant coverage with its easy-to-use sponge applicator.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Concealer Instant Age Rewind Fair 03**
â­ Step 1: Twist the sponge applicator in the direction of the arrows until the concealer is visible on the sponge.
â­ Step 2: Apply concealer directly to the under-eye area, blending in an outward motion.
â­ Step 3: For extremely dark circles, apply the Neutralizer shade under the concealer shade.
â­ Step 4: For a luminous touch, apply the Brightener shade to the inner corner of the eyes, brow bones, and bridge of the nose.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Concealer Instant Age Rewind Fair 03**
â­ Vegan formula.
â­ Non-comedogenic.
â­ Formulated without mineral oil.
â­ Formulated without parabens.
â­ Formulated without talc.
â­ Sponge tip applicator for easy application.
â­ Provides up to 12 hours of moisturizing wear.
â­ Crease-resistant coverage.

title_ar: Ù…ÙŠØ¨Ù„ÙŠÙ† ÙƒÙˆÙ†Ø³ÙŠÙ„Ø± Ø§Ù†Ø³ØªÙ†Øª Ø§ÙŠØ¬ Ø±ÙŠÙˆØ§ÙŠÙ†Ø¯ Ù‡ÙˆÙ†ÙŠ 04 | ØªØºØ·ÙŠØ© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø© ÙˆØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨
description_en:
**Maybelline Concealer Instant Age Rewind Honey 04**: Discover the secret to radiance and perfection with our all-in-one concealer that combines hydration and flawless coverage.

This multi-use concealer from Maybelline does it all: it hydrates your skin, conceals imperfections, contours your features, and corrects signs of fatigue, all with a simple click. Enjoy up to 12 hours of moisturizing wear with crease-resistant coverage thanks to its innovative sponge tip applicator.

**Maybelline Concealer Instant Age Rewind Honey 04** is formulated to be vegan, non-comedogenic, and free from mineral oil, parabens, and talc, providing you with the best care for your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Concealer Instant Age Rewind Honey 04**:
â­ Step 1: Twist the sponge applicator in the direction of the arrows until the concealer is visible on the sponge.
â­ Step 2: Apply concealer directly to the under-eye area, blending in an outward motion for natural coverage.
â­ Step 3: For extremely dark circles, apply the Neutralizer shade under the concealer shade to color-correct.
â­ Step 4: For a luminous touch, apply the Brightener shade to the inner corner of the eyes, brow bones, and bridge of the nose.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Concealer Instant Age Rewind Honey 04**:
â­ Liquid formula for easy blending and application.
â­ Precision sponge tip for perfect distribution.
â­ Free from mineral oil, parabens, and talc.
â­ Vegan ingredients for long-lasting hydration.

description_en:
Achieve a flawless complexion with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder Foundation**, your ultimate 12-hour oil-control powder foundation. This powder blends seamlessly into your skin, providing an all-day mattifying look and feel, making it a perfect choice for hot weather. Experience natural, poreless coverage with added SPF 28 sun protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder Foundation**:
â­ Apply the powder to your face using the included sponge or a powder brush.
â­ Blend the powder in downward strokes to ensure even application and avoid highlighting fine hairs.
â­ Can be used alone or over foundation for a matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder Foundation**:
â­ Talc
â­ Mica
â­ Magnesium Stearate
â­ Isopropyl Palmitate
â­ Titanium Dioxide
â­ Silica
â­ Other ingredients.

description_en:
Discover the magic of extended lashes with **Maybelline The Falsies Surreal Mascara**. This innovative mascara delivers +36% real lash length and a surreal 10X volume impact for wider, more captivating eyes. Enjoy up to 24-hour wear without smudging or flaking. Its luxurious formula is vegan, free from animal-derived ingredients or by-products.

â­ Get up to +36% real lash length.
â­ Achieve up to 10X surreal volume.
â­ Enjoy long-lasting wear for up to 24 hours.
â­ Smudge and flake-resistant for a perfect finish.
â­ Features Hybrid Fiber technology with varying fiber sizes up to 3mm for professional application.
â­ The extended helix brush reaches every lash for dramatic impact.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline The Falsies Surreal Mascara**:
â­ Sweep from root to tip for instant length and volume.
â­ Build desired intensity for your perfect look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline The Falsies Surreal Mascara**:
â­ Vegan and cruelty-free formula.
â­ Enriched with fibers for lash extension.
â­ High-quality ingredients for lash nourishment.

#Mascara #Lashes #Maybelline #EyeMakeup #LongLashes #VolumeLashes #SaudiBeauty #MakeupSaudi #Beauty #TheFalsiesSurreal

description_en:
Experience the new **Maybelline Lifter Plump Hydrating Lip Blush Blaze**, your ultimate secret to fuller, more kissable lips with an instant heated sensation. This gloss delivers intense shine and a warming effect, leaving your lips visibly plumper and more vibrant, instantly and over time.

â­ Provides an intense heated sensation for instantly fuller-looking lips.
â­ XL wand transforms lips in one swipe, defining your pout.
â­ Formulated with Maxi-Lipâ„¢ and chili pepper for a plumping boost.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lifter Plump Hydrating Lip Blush Blaze**:
â­ Step 1: Apply the gloss with the XL Wandâ„¢ applicator in the center of your upper lip and follow the contours of your mouth.
â­ Step 2: Glide the lip gloss across the entire bottom lip.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lifter Plump Hydrating Lip Blush Blaze**:
â­ Enriched with Maxi-Lipâ„¢ and chili pepper for remarkable results.

Caution & Warnings:
â­ Flammable until dry. Do not use near fire, flame, or heat.
â­ May cause a temporary tingling sensation, which is normal.
â­ Discontinue use if you experience excessive discomfort.
â­ Do not touch eyes or use on chapped, damaged, or sensitive lips.

#Maybelline #LifterPlump #LipGloss #PlumpLips #LipCare #SaudiMakeup #KSABeauty #JeddahFashion #LipHydration #BlazeLip

Achieve a long-lasting, natural matte look with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation**. This innovative formula offers up to 16-hour oil control and SPF22, giving your skin a shine-free finish and blurring imperfections. Ideal for normal to oily skin, its micro-fine powders refine pores and absorb shine for a flawless complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation**:
â­ Start by applying primer to your skin.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation** to your face.
â­ Blend evenly using fingertips, a brush, or a sponge for a uniform coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation**:
â­ Advanced oil-control formula.
â­ SPF22 Sunscreen protection.
â­ Micro-fine powders for pore refinement and shine absorption.
â­ Natural matte finish.
â­ Suitable for normal to oily skin.

#Maybelline #FitMe #Foundation #SaudiMakeup #MatteSkin #FullCoverage #ShineControl #DailyMakeup #BestFoundation #MaybellineKSA

description_en:
Achieve flawless skin with **Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Concealer Caramel 10**, the magical concealer that hydrates, conceals, contours, and corrects in one step. Enjoy up to 12 hours of moisturizing wear with crease-resistant coverage thanks to its unique sponge tip applicator. Its formula is vegan, non-comedogenic, and formulated without mineral oil, parabens, or talc, making it the perfect choice for your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Concealer Caramel 10**

â­ Step 1: Twist the sponge applicator in the direction of the arrows until the concealer is visible on the sponge.
â­ Step 2: Apply concealer directly to the under-eye area, blending in an outward motion.
â­ Step 3: For extremely dark circles, apply the Neutralizer shade under the concealer shade.
â­ Step 4: For a luminous touch, apply the Brightener shade to the inner corner of the eyes, brow bones, and bridge of the nose.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Concealer Caramel 10**

â­ Vegan formula.
â­ Non-comedogenic.
â­ Formulated without mineral oil.
â­ Formulated without parabens.
â­ Formulated without talc.

#Maybelline #Concealer #EyeMakeup #SkinHydration #FlawlessSkin #FullCoverage #RadiantSkin #SaudiMakeup #MaybellineKSA #BeautyKSA

description_en:
Experience intense hydration and a fuller pout with **Maybelline Lifter Plump** lip gloss in Cocoa Zing. This must-have from Maybelline New York delivers an immediate heated sensation and a lasting plump effect for visibly enhanced lips.

â­ Provides an intense heated sensation and a fuller lip look.
â­ Features an XL wand for a one-swipe transformation, defining your lip contour.
â­ Delivers intense shine with a warming, plumping feel.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lifter Plump**:
â­ Step 1: Apply the lip gloss using the XL Wand applicator to the center of your upper lip and follow your mouth's contours.
â­ Step 2: Glide the lip gloss across your entire bottom lip for even coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lifter Plump**:
â­ Formulated with chili pepper for that signature heated, plumping sensation.
â­ Enriched with Maxi-Lipâ„¢ to hydrate and enhance lip volume.

Caution & Warnings:
â­ Flammable until dry.
â­ Do not use near fire, flame, or heat.
â­ This product may cause a temporary tingling sensation which is normal.
â­ Discontinue use if you experience excessive discomfort.
â­ Do not touch eyes or use on chapped, damaged, or sensitive lips.

description_en:
Introducing Maybelline New York's new next-level lip gloss: **Maybelline Lifter Gloss with Hyaluronic Acid**.

Experience hydrated, fuller-looking lips with this breakthrough formula featuring Hyaluronic Acid. **Maybelline Lifter Gloss with Hyaluronic Acid** visibly smoothes lip surface and enhances lip contour with high shine for hydrated, fuller-looking lips in an easy, one-swipe application. This hydrating lip gloss is available in a full range of modern shades.

â­ Hydrated, and natural fuller-looking lips.

Discover the new upgraded Maybelline New York formula now with more extended oil control! Now formulated with SPF22 and 16-Hour Oil Control for the perfect natural matte finish that lasts all day! Now comes in a premium glass bottle with a pump for the most accessible application. Available in 24 tone-fitting shades, **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless** has been designed for normal to oily skin. Its blurring micro powders refine pores and absorb shine for a natural matte finish, leaving your skin looking poreless.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless**:
â­ Apply on your skin after primer to even out your skin tone for a flawless look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless**:
â­ SPF22 Sun Protection Factor
â­ Oil-controlling micro powders
â­ 16-Hour wear formula

â­ Natural matte finish
â­ Pore-refining properties

Achieve flawless skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Luminous + Smooth Primer**. This innovative primer blurs pores, minimizes imperfections, and controls shine for a natural, matte-free makeup look that lasts 16 hours. Infused with mattifying minerals, this formula smooths and evens skin tone, creating the perfect canvas for your makeup. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Luminous + Smooth Primer**:
â­ Smooth onto bare skin before applying makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Luminous + Smooth Primer**:
â­ Formula enriched with mattifying minerals.
â­ Hydrating ingredients for skin smoothing.
â­ SPF 20 protection.

description_en:
Achieve salon-lifted lashes from the comfort of your home with **Maybelline The Falsies Lash Lift Mascara**. This waterproof formula delivers dramatic length, volume, and lift for an instant lash lift effect that lasts all day. The unique double-curved lifting brush ensures each lash is coated and separated for a bold, lifted look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline The Falsies Lash Lift Mascara**:
â­ Step 1: Hold the brush against your lashes at the root and sweep from root to tip, building length.
â­ Step 2: Repeat the process, ensuring the brush separates each lash for maximum volume and lift.
â­ Step 3: Apply a second coat if desired, but do not let it dry between coats for a clump-free finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline The Falsies Lash Lift Mascara**:
â­ All-day waterproof formula for long-lasting wear.
â­ Double-curved lifting brush for enhanced lift and volume.
â­ Provides dramatic length and a lifted lash effect.

#MaybellineMascara #LashLift #LongLashes #VolumeMascara #SaudiBeauty #RiyadhMakeup #WaterproofMascara #EyeMakeup #BeautySaudi #MaybellineKSA

description_en:
Discover the secret to a flawless Lumi-Matte finish with **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**. Experience air-light wear with up to 30 hours of transfer-proof, waterproof, and sweat-proof perfection. This buildable, full-coverage formula delivers ultimate staying power without caking or patchiness, for a soft glow that lasts. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Apply 1-2 pumps to clean, hydrated skin.
â­ Blend with a foundation brush, fingers, or a beauty sponge for an even complexion.
â­ Layer for additional coverage if needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**:
â­ Vegan formula.
â­ Longwear goes light as air.
â­ Transfer-proof, waterproof, sweatproof.
â­ New Light wear technology for Lumi-Matte look.
â­ Buildable full coverage.

#Maybelline #Foundation #SaudiMakeup #FullCoverage #Longlasting #RadiantSkin #NaturalGlow #FaceMakeup #SaudiBeauty #MaybellineSuperStay

description_en:
Achieve unparalleled definition with the **Maybelline Tatto Liner Pen Deep Onyx 900 - Dark**. This eyeliner delivers intense color and a smooth finish that lasts up to 36 hours, making it your perfect choice for a bold and radiant look all day long. Enjoy its ease of use and effortless glide across your eyelid, with superior water resistance that ensures its hold for up to 24 hours. It's ready for repeated use to give your eyes the perfect definition every time.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Tatto Liner Pen Deep Onyx 900 - Dark**
â­ Step 1. Line along the upper lash line.
â­ Step 2. Line along the bottom lash line.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Tatto Liner Pen Deep Onyx 900 - Dark**
â­ High-intensity eyeliner.
â­ Soft and creamy texture.
â­ Easy to use and glides effortlessly across the eyelid.
â­ Water resistant.
â­ Holds for up to 24 hours.
â­ Practical pen design for repeated use.

#Maybelline #TattoLiner #Eyeliner #EyeMakeup #Waterproof #SaudiMakeup #EyeDefinition #Kajal #BeautySaudi #Longwear

description_en:
Discover the secret to radiant, sun-kissed cheeks with **Maybelline Sun Kisser Liquid Blush 01 Downtown Rush**. This enchanting product delivers long-lasting, tanned, and radiant cheeks, as if you've just returned from a refreshing summer vacation. Its ultra-blendable and buildable formula melts seamlessly into your skin, providing a natural glow that lasts up to 12 hours. Available in a variety of blush and multi-use bronze shades, you can mix and match them to achieve any look you desire, from a natural blush touch to a multi-dimensional luminous glow.

Grant your complexion a sun-kissed flush of color with the **Maybelline Sun Kisser Liquid Blush from Maybelline**. Infused with vitamin E and melt-to-skin pigments, this liquid blush effortlessly blends into the skin to deliver buildable, glowing color that catches the light at every angle.

The convenient doe-foot applicator allows for easy and controlled application â€“ simply dot, dot, and blend. Whether you're elevating your natural makeup look or experimenting with the sunset blush trend, the glowy liquid formula is available in five shades to bronze, add color, and highlight your skin. Vegan.

â­ Buildable color for a natural flush of radiance.
â­ Long-lasting formula with a smooth, flawless finish.
â­ Easy to apply and blend for a seamless, perfected look.
â­ Melt-to-skin, non-stick formula for comfortable wear.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Sun Kisser Liquid Blush 01 Downtown Rush**
â­ Using the plush dot applicator, apply product to face.
â­ Build and blend as desired.
â­ Dot and blend a single shade to get a glowy, natural look.
â­ Build with other shades to create dimension and a more intense look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Sun Kisser Liquid Blush 01 Downtown Rush**
â­ Aqua / Water, Dimethicone, Isododecane, Alcohol Denat., Butylene Glycol, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Perlite, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Nylon-12, Isopropyl Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Bis-Peg/Ppg-14/14 Dimethicone, Magnesium Sulfate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Phenoxyethanol, Silica Silylate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Dipentaerythrityl Tetrahydroxystearate/Tetraisostearate, Tocopherol, Triethoxysilylethyl Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Glycerin, Empetrum Nigrum Fruit Juice, Silica, Tin Oxide, Potassium Sorbate, [+/- May Contain Mica, Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 / Iron Oxides, Ci 19140 / Yellow 5 Lake, Ci 15850 / Red 7, Ci 77007 / Ultramarines.

#Maybelline #MaybellineBlush #LiquidBlush #FaceMakeup #NaturalGlow #SunKissedCheeks #SummerMakeup #SaudiMakeup #SaudiBeauty #ProMakeup

description_en:
Achieve flawless skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation 115 - Ivory**. This foundation is designed for normal to oily skin, featuring blurring micro-powders that refine pores and absorb shine for a natural, matte finish. Enjoy a poreless-looking complexion that feels as good as it looks.

â­ 100% Matte finish.
â­ Blurs pores for a smoother appearance.
â­ Seamlessly fits your skin and texture.
â­ Absorbs shine for a controlled look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation 115 - Ivory**
â­ Apply to clean skin after primer for an even skin tone and a flawless complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation 115 - Ivory**
â­ Blurring micro-powders to minimize the appearance of pores.
â­ Shine-absorbing ingredients to control excess oil.
â­ Lightweight formula for comfortable, all-day wear.

description_en:
Experience incredible longwear with an unparalleled lightness with **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**. This foundation revolutionizes face makeup, offering buildable full coverage in a formula thatâ€™s 27% lighter than traditional foundations. Achieve the 'Lumi-Matte' look, a sophisticated blend of a matte finish and a diffused, radiant glow that lasts for up to 30 hours. Perfect for those in Saudi Arabia seeking superior staying power and a feather-light feel on the skin.

â­ 30H longwear that is transfer proof, waterproof, and sweatproof.
â­ New light wear technology for a unique Lumi-Matte look.
â­ Buildable full coverage to customize your desired finish.
â­ Vegan formula and free from pore-clogging ingredients.
â­ Dermatologist-tested and allergy-tested for peace of mind.
â­ Weightless feel for comfortable wear all day long.
â­ Available in 17 diverse shades to suit all skin tones.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**:
â­ Shake well before use to ensure product consistency.
â­ Apply 1-2 pumps to clean, hydrated skin.
â­ Blend with a foundation brush, fingers, or a beauty sponge for an even complexion.
â­ If needed, apply additional foundation for extra coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**:
â­ Innovative vegan formula.
â­ Water/Aqua/Eau, Dimethicone, Isododecane, Alcohol Denat., Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Butylene Glycol, Lauryl Polyglyceryl-3 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Magnesium Sulfate, Phenoxyethanol, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Propylene Carbonate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Tri Isostearate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol, Citric Acid, BHT, Alumina, Polyhydroxystearic Acid. (Exact ingredient list may vary.)

description_en:
Discover the secret to perfect lips with **Maybelline Lifter Liner**, the innovative lip liner from Maybelline New York. Enjoy precise and smooth definition thanks to its Hyaluronic acid-infused formula, delivering a smooth feel with no tug. **Maybelline Lifter Liner** offers creamy, long-lasting, and transfer-proof colors, featuring a sharpenable tip for ultra-precise lines. Coordinate its eight shades with your favorite lip gloss for a complete and attractive look. Unveil the magic of defined, vibrant lips with this essential tool in your collection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lifter Liner**
â­ Precisely define your lip line using the soft pencil tip.
â­ Choose a shade that complements your lipstick or favorite lip gloss.
â­ For best results, gently blend the color with the rest of your lips.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lifter Liner**
â­ Completely vegan formula.
â­ Enriched with Hyaluronic acid for lip hydration and smoothing.
â­ Long-lasting and transfer-proof.

description_en:
Grant your complexion a sun-kissed flush of colour with the **Maybelline Sun Kisser Liquid Blush 08 Shades On**. Infused with vitamin E and melt-to-skin pigments, this liquid blush effortlessly blends into the skin to deliver buildable, glowing colour that catches the light at every angle.

This liquid blush features an easy-to-blend formula that provides a natural, radiant flush that lasts. Whether you prefer a subtle or a more dramatic look, this product will give you a perfect finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Sun Kisser Liquid Blush 08 Shades On**:
â­ Using the plush dot applicator, apply product to face.
â­ Dot, dot and blend as desired.
â­ Build with other shades to create dimension and a more intense look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Sun Kisser Liquid Blush 08 Shades On**:
â­ Aqua / Water, Dimethicone, Isododecane, Alcohol Denat., Butylene Glycol, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Perlite, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Nylon-12, Isopropyl Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Bis-Peg/Ppg-14/14 Dimethicone, Magnesium Sulfate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Phenoxyethanol, Silica Silylate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Dipentaerythrityl Tetrahydroxystearate/Tetraisostearate, Tocopherol, Triethoxysilylethyl Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Glycerin, Empetrum Nigrum Fruit Juice, Silica, Tin Oxide, Potassium Sorbate, [+/- May Contain Mica, Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 / Iron Oxides, Ci 19140 / Yellow 5 Lake, Ci 15850 / Red 7, Ci 77007 / Ultramarines.

shortdescription_en: Maybelline's sun-kissed liquid blush. Vitamin E-infused, easy-to-blend formula for a lasting glow.

title_en: Maybelline Sunkisser Blush 12 Summer In The City
title_ar: Ù…ÙŠØ¨ÙŠÙ„ÙŠÙ† Ø³Ù†ÙƒÙŠØ³Ø± Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± Ø®Ø¯ÙˆØ¯ Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ - 12 Ø³Ù…Ø± Ø¥Ù† Ø°Ø§ Ø³ÙŠØªÙŠ
description_en:
Achieve a sun-kissed flush of colour with **Maybelline Sunkisser Blush** in shade "12 Summer In The City". This liquid blush is infused with vitamin E and melt-to-skin pigments, effortlessly blending to deliver buildable, glowing colour that catches the light. The convenient doe-foot applicator ensures easy and controlled application, perfect for a natural or more intense sculpted look. **Maybelline Sunkisser Blush** melts seamlessly into the skin to highlight your features and is ideal for everything from your no-makeup makeup look to experimenting with the sunset blush trend. Its vegan formula ensures comfortable wear all day.

**Product Features:**
â­ Buildable colour for a natural flush of radiance.
â­ Long-lasting formula with a smooth, flawless finish.
â­ Easy to apply and blend for a seamless, perfected look.
â­ Melt-to-skin, non-stick formula for comfortable wear.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Sunkisser Blush**
â­ Using the plush dot applicator, apply product to your face.
â­ Build and blend as desired for increased intensity.
â­ A single dot is perfect for a glowy, natural look.
â­ Layer with other shades to create dimension and a more intense finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Sunkisser Blush**
â­ Aqua / Water, Dimethicone, Isododecane, Alcohol Denat., Butylene Glycol, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Perlite, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Nylon-12, Isopropyl Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Bis-Peg/Ppg-14/14 Dimethicone, Magnesium Sulfate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Phenoxyethanol, Silica Silylate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Dipentaerythrityl Tetrahydroxystearate/Tetraisostearate, Tocopherol, Triethoxysilylethyl Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Glycerin, Empetrum Nigrum Fruit Juice, Silica, Tin Oxide, Potassium Sorbate, [+/- May Contain Mica, Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 / Iron Oxides, Ci 19140 / Yellow 5 Lake, Ci 15850 / Red 7, Ci 77007 / Ultramarines.

description_en:
Achieve flawless skin with the **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Primer**. This innovative primer effectively blurs pores, minimizes imperfections, and controls shine for a long-lasting, natural matte finish that lasts up to 16 hours. Infused with mattifying minerals, this formula smooths and evens out skin tone, making it your first step towards a flawless makeup application. Our **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Primer** provides a matte finish with SPF 20 protection for your perfect start.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Primer**:
â­ Apply a small amount to clean, dry skin before foundation or makeup.
â­ Can be worn alone for a smooth, matte complexion or paired with foundation to extend makeup wear and enhance your look all day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Primer**:
â­ Contains mattifying minerals to absorb excess oil.
â­ Contributes to smoothing the skin's surface.
â­ Helps to even out skin tone.

description_en:
Discover the perfect shade with **Maybelline New York Superstay Matte Ink 180 Revol Pink**, the liquid lipstick that delivers a long-lasting, flawlessly matte finish with super pigmentation. Enjoy rich, captivating color that lasts up to 16 hours without smudging or drying.

â­ Flawless matte finish.
â­ Lasts up to 16 hours.
â­ Waterproof.
â­ Precision applicator.
â­ Available in multiple shades for every look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Superstay Matte Ink 180 Revol Pink**:
1. Choose your perfect shade.
2. Use the applicator to precisely line your lips, focusing on the cupid's bow.
3. Apply evenly to the upper and lower lips.
4. For sharp edges, use the tip of the applicator.
5. Allow the lipstick to dry completely for a long-lasting matte finish.

description_en:
Achieve flawless-looking skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless**. Discover the upgraded Maybelline New York formula, now featuring enhanced 16-hour oil control for a perfect natural matte finish that lasts all day. Enriched with SPF 22, it provides essential sun protection for your skin. Designed specifically for normal to oily skin types, **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless** uses blurring micro powders to refine pores and absorb shine, leaving you with a smooth, shine-free complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless**:
â­ Apply to your skin after primer to even out your skin tone for a seamless base.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless**:
â­ Advanced oil-control formula.
â­ SPF 22 for sun protection.
â­ Micro-blurring powders to minimize pores and mattify shine.
â­ Available in 24 tone-fitting shades for a perfect match.

#MaybellineNY #FitMe #Foundation #SaudiMakeup #FullCoverage #MatteSkin #GulfBeauty #NaturalFinish #SaudiBeauty #MakeupDeals

description_en:
Unveil your radiant beauty with **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation 30hr Longwear Formula 140**. Achieve a matte Lumi-Matte look with a diffused glow that lasts for up to 30 hours, in a formula 27% lighter than normal foundation*. This buildable full coverage superhero delivers super staying power, is transfer-proof, waterproof, and sweat-proof. Experience a weightless feel that never cakes or patches.

â­ Longwear goes light as air.
â­ 30H longwear that is transfer-proof, waterproof, sweatproof.
â­ New Light wear technology for Lumi-Matte look.
â­ Buildable full coverage.
â­ Vegan formula.
â­ Dermatologist tested, allergy tested, non-comedogenic.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation 30hr Longwear Formula 140**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Apply 1-2 pumps to clean, hydrated skin.
â­ Blend with a foundation brush, fingers, or beauty sponge to even out complexion.
â­ Apply more foundation for extra coverage if needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation 30hr Longwear Formula 140**:
â­ (Full ingredient list available on packaging - Vegan Formula)

description_en:
Achieve a natural, radiant look with **Maybelline New York Fit Me Fresh Tint**. This foundation, infused with Vitamin C and SPF 50, evens out and protects your skin, delivering a bright and healthy appearance. Its skin-kind formula glides on effortlessly, leaving a fresh, natural finish perfect for daily wear.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Fit Me Fresh Tint**:
â­ Apply to your skin daily to even out your skin tone and protect your skin.
â­ Blend with a fingertip, sponge, or brush for seamless coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Fit Me Fresh Tint**:
â­ Vitamin C: To boost radiance and combat dark spots.
â­ SPF 50: For effective protection against harmful sun rays.
â­ Lightweight Formula: Provides skin with a moisturized and refreshed feeling all day.

description_en:
Experience lightweight longwear with **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**. This foundation offers buildable full coverage with a matte-lumi finish and a natural diffused glow that lasts up to 30 hours. Its unique formula is 27% lighter than regular foundation, providing an unparalleled comfortable feel. It's transfer-proof, waterproof, and sweatproof, ensuring a flawless look all day without caking or patchiness.

â­ 30H longwear, transfer-proof, waterproof, sweatproof.
â­ Lightweight Lumi-Matte formula with a natural diffused glow.
â­ Buildable full coverage in one swipe.
â­ Vegan, dermatologist-tested, and non-comedogenic.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Apply 1-2 pumps to clean, hydrated skin.
â­ Blend using a foundation brush, fingers, or a beauty sponge for an even complexion.
â­ Apply additional foundation for extra coverage if needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**:
*Ingredients may vary, please refer to the packaging for the most up-to-date ingredient list.

description_en:
Discover **Maybelline New York Tattoo Brow 3-Day Styling Gel**, the ultimate solution for effortlessly defined, natural-looking brows that wow and last up to 3 days! This semi-permanent tinted eyebrow gel is waterproof, smudge-proof, and climate-proof for flawless results. The innovative two-way mini brush ensures an easy, mistake-proof application that precisely shapes and defines your brows. Make your eyebrow routine easier than ever with **Maybelline New York Tattoo Brow 3-Day Styling Gel** for a long-lasting, natural makeup look. Available in 3 shades.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Tattoo Brow 3-Day Styling Gel**
â­ For best results, hold the brush against the brow and repeatedly extend from root to tip to evenly distribute the gel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Tattoo Brow 3-Day Styling Gel**
â­ Tinted Gel
â­ Waterproof
â­ Smudge-proof
â­ Climate-proof
â­ Up to 3-day wear
â­ Two-way brush for easy application

description_en:
Achieve flawless perfection with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Foundation 112 - Beige**, expertly crafted for your skin to deliver a natural, shine-free, and poreless-looking finish. Its innovative formula features blurring micro-powders that refine pores while absorbing shine, ensuring your skin looks smooth, even-toned, and beautifully matte all day long.

The **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Foundation 112 - Beige** provides a natural and captivating look, boasting exceptional features:

â­ 100% Matte Finish.
â­ Blurs Pores effectively.
â­ Seamlessly fits your skin and texture.
â­ Absorbs excess shine for a shine-free complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Foundation 112 - Beige**

â­ Apply a small amount to your skin after using primer.
â­ Blend the foundation evenly across your face using your fingertips, a brush, or a sponge for a perfect finish and uniform color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Foundation 112 - Beige**

â­ Blurring micro-powders for refined pores.
â­ Shine-absorbing ingredients to combat oiliness.
â­ Skin-friendly formulation.

Experience intense shine and a plump effect with **Lifter Plump** by Maybelline New York.

This game-changing lip gloss delivers an immediate heated sensation and a lasting plump, hydrated look.

â­ Provides an instant warm, tingling sensation for fuller-looking lips.

â­ Enriched with Maxi-Lipâ„¢ and chili pepper extract for enhanced plumpness.
â­ Delivers intense shine and a hydrating feel.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lifter Plump**:

â­ Step 1: Apply lip gloss with the XL Wandâ„¢ applicator in the center of your upper lip and follow the contours of your mouth.
â­ Step 2: Glide the lip gloss across the entire bottom lip.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lifter Plump**:

â­ Castor Oil.
â­ Peppermint Oil.
â­ Chili Pepper Extract.
â­ Beeswax.
â­ Vitamin E.

description_en:
Discover unparalleled lightness with **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**, 27% lighter than normal foundation*. Achieve the Lumi-Matte look that stays matte with a diffused glow that lasts for up to 30 hours. This buildable full coverage superhero delivers super staying power in one swipe, fueled by its light wear technology for a uniquely weightless feel and soft glow to longwear. It's transfer-proof, waterproof, and sweat-proof, with no caking or patchiness. Available in 17 shades, with a vegan formula, and is dermatologist-tested, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic.

Product Features:
â­ Longwear goes light as air
â­ 30H longwear that is transfer-proof, waterproof, sweatproof.
â­ New Light wear technology for Lumi-Matte look
â­ Buildable full coverage
â­ Vegan

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Apply 1-2 pumps to clean, hydrated skin.
â­ Blend with a foundation brush, fingers, or beauty sponge to even out complexion.
â­ If needed, apply more foundation for extra coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**:
â­ Advanced formula for long-lasting wear and a natural finish.
â­ Lightweight ingredients for a comfortable feel.
â­ Blend of moisturizing agents for skin comfort.
â­ Color pigments for perfect coverage.

#Maybelline #Foundation #SaudiMakeup #FullCoverage #Longwear #LumiMatte #GlowingSkin #BeautyProducts #ProMakeup #SuperStay

description_en:
Achieve perfectly defined, long-lasting brows with the **Maybelline Tattoo Brow 36H Waterproof Pencil**. This highly pigmented, easy-to-use pencil delivers up to 36 hours of impactful brow definition.

Effortlessly define, fill, and fix uneven eyebrows without smudging or fading throughout the day. Get a flawless, professional look that lasts.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Tattoo Brow 36H Waterproof Pencil**:
â­ Sharpen the pencil tip as desired for precise application.
â­ Draw small, light strokes along the brow contour.
â­ Use the built-in brush to groom hairs upward and outward, blending color and setting brows.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Tattoo Brow 36H Waterproof Pencil**:
â­ High-pigment formula.
â­ Sharpenable tip for flexible application.
â­ Integrated brush for blending and setting.

description_en:
Discover flawless coverage and oil control with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder**. This compact powder foundation is your go-to for up to 12 hours of oil control, blending seamlessly into your skin for an all-day mattifying look and feel. 

**Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder** delivers a natural matte, poreless finish, making it perfect for hot weather. It effectively blurs the appearance of pores, leaving your skin looking smooth and perfected. Enhanced with SPF 28, it also provides essential sun protection for your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder**
â­ Apply powder to the face using the included sponge or a powder brush.
â­ Use a downward motion when applying to avoid making fine hairs more visible.
â­ Reapply as needed for increased coverage or to refresh your look throughout the day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder**
â­ Talc: For oil absorption and a matte finish.

description_en:
Achieve flawless, shine-free skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation SPF 125**. This upgraded Maybelline New York formula offers an extended oil control, now with SPF22, for a perfect natural matte finish that lasts up to 16 hours. Designed for normal to oily skin, its blurring micro powders refine pores and absorb shine, leaving you with a smooth, poreless-looking complexion. Available in a premium glass bottle with a pump for effortless application and 24 tone-fitting shades for your perfect match.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation SPF 125**:
â­ Apply to your skin after primer to even out your skin tone and achieve the best coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation SPF 125**:
â­ 16-Hour Oil Control Formula.
â­ Contains SPF22 for sun protection.
â­ Blurring micro powders that refine pores and mattify shine.
â­ Suitable for normal to oily skin.

#Maybelline #FitMe #Foundation #MatteSkin #LongLastingMakeup #SaudiMakeup #RiyadhBeauty #JeddahFashion #KSA #BeautyEssentials

title_ar: Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ¨ÙŠÙ„ÙŠÙ† Ù†ÙŠÙˆÙŠÙˆØ±Ùƒ Ø³ÙˆØ¨Ø± Ø³ØªØ§ÙŠ Ù…Ø§Øª Ø¥Ù†Ùƒ - Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ ØºÙŠØ± Ù„Ø§Ù…Ø¹ ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Elevate your lip game with **Maybelline New York Super Stay Matte Ink**, the liquid lipstick that delivers a rich matte finish and a flawless, long-lasting look. Explore our wide range of super-pigmented shades, from subtle nudes and classic reds to bold tones and everyday peaches. This liquid lipstick boasts a waterproof formula for perfect wear, no matter how long your day is, with a show-stopping matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Super Stay Matte Ink**:
â­ Choose the perfect shade that reflects your personality and occasion.
â­ Use the precise applicator to define your cupid's bow and upper lip with accuracy.
â­ Mirror this application on the other half of your top lip, shading in evenly.
â­ For your bottom lip, use the tip of the applicator for precise control along the lip contours.
â­ Allow the lipstick to dry for a few minutes to achieve a perfect matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Super Stay Matte Ink**:
â­ Matte finish that lasts up to 16 hours.
â­ Unique arrow applicator for precise application.
â­ Available in a variety of rich shades.
â­ Waterproof formula.

#Maybelline #Lipstick #SaudiMakeup #MatteLips #KSAFashion #LongLastingLipstick #MaybellineNY #SaudiBeauty #MakeupAddict #BeautyKSA

description_en:
Achieve a flawless matte finish with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder Foundation** with SPF 118. This foundation powder offers 24-hour oil control, effectively minimizing shine and reducing the appearance of pores for a smooth, natural-looking complexion. Its skin-fitting pigments blend seamlessly, providing comfortable, breathable, and high coverage that lasts all day, making it perfect for humid weather. It also includes SPF protection for your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder Foundation**:
â­ Using the included applicator, apply to the forehead, nose, cheeks, and chin.
â­ Blend all over the face using gentle downward strokes for a natural finish.
â­ Can be worn alone or on top of foundation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder Foundation**:
â­ Advanced powder formula for oil and shine control.
â­ Skin-fitting pigments for seamless blending.
â­ SPF for sun protection.
â­ Comfortable and breathable formula.

#Maybelline #FitMePowder #FaceMakeup #Foundation #MatteFinish #OilControl #FullCoverage #SaudiMakeup #Beauty #DailyMakeup

description_en:
Discover the new upgraded Maybelline New York formula now with extended oil control! Formulated with SPF22 and 16-Hour Oil Control for the perfect natural matte finish that lasts all day. Now comes in a premium glass bottle with a pump for the most accessible and perfect application. **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Porless** is available in 24 tone-fitting shades, specifically designed for normal to oily skin. Its blurring micro powders refine pores and absorb shine for a natural matte finish, leaving your skin looking poreless.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Porless**:
â­ Apply to your skin after primer to even out your skin tone and achieve a flawless complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Porless**:
â­ Lightweight formula for 16-hour oil control.
â­ SPF22 sun protection.
â­ Micro-fine powders to blur pores and reduce shine.
â­ Buildable coverage for a natural look.
â­ Suitable for normal to oily skin.

#Maybelline #FitMe #Foundation #SaudiMakeup #MatteSkin #FullCoverage #MakeupBase #SaudiBeauty #BeautyProducts #Riyadh

title_en: Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation 30HR Wear - Shade 327
title_ar: Ù…ÙŠØ¨Ù„ÙŠÙ† Ø³ÙˆØ¨Ø± Ø³ØªØ§ÙŠ Ù„ÙˆÙ…ÙŠ Ù…Ø§Øª ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø£Ø³Ø§Ø³ ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… 30 Ø³Ø§Ø¹Ø© - Ø¯Ø±Ø¬Ø© 327
description_en:
Step out with confidence with the **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation 30HR Wear Formula** in shade 327, longwear that goes light as air. This foundation is 27% lighter than traditional foundations, delivering the Lumi-Matte look that stays matte with a diffused glow that lasts up to 30 hours. This buildable full coverage superhero provides super staying power in one swipe, fueled by its light wear technology for a uniquely weightless feel and soft glow to longwear. It's transfer-proof, waterproof, and sweat-proof, with no caking or patchiness. Vegan formula, dermatologist-tested, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic.

â­ The **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation 30HR Wear Formula** in shade 327 offers longwear that feels light as air.
â­ Up to 30-hour wear, transfer-proof, waterproof, and sweatproof.
â­ New light wear technology for the perfect Lumi-Matte look.
â­ Buildable full coverage for a flawless complexion.
â­ Vegan formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation 30HR Wear Formula**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Apply 1-2 pumps to clean, hydrated skin.
â­ Blend with a foundation brush, fingers, or a makeup sponge.
â­ Layer for additional coverage if needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation 30HR Wear Formula**:
â­ Vegan formula.
â­ Dermatologist tested.
â­ Allergy tested.
â­ Non-comedogenic.

description_en:
Ink your lips in gorgeous, long-lasting matte lip color with **Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink** Liquid Lipstick.

This lipstick delivers a super-pigmented, flawless matte finish that stays put for up to 16 hours, making it perfect for any occasion. Featuring a unique arrow applicator for precise application, achieve perfectly defined lips with unparalleled comfort and rich, enduring color, even through eating and drinking.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink**:
â­ Choose your perfect shade.
â­ Use the applicator to precisely outline your cupid's bow.
â­ Apply evenly to the upper lip, then transfer to the lower lip.
â­ Allow the color to dry to a perfect matte finish for a few minutes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink**:
â­ Super-pigmented matte liquid formula.
â­ Precision applicator for easy application.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients for lip comfort.

description_en:
Achieve flawless, perfected skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation**. Its innovative formula refines pores and absorbs excess shine, delivering a natural, matte finish that lasts all day. **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation** is designed for normal to oily skin, seamlessly blending to create a poreless-looking complexion with a unified tone.

â­ 100% Matte finish.
â­ Blurs pores for a smooth appearance.
â­ Fits your skin tone and texture perfectly.
â­ Absorbs shine for an oil-free look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation**:
â­ Apply a small amount of foundation to your skin after primer.
â­ Blend evenly using your fingertips, a brush, or a sponge for seamless coverage and a natural look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation**:
â­ Blurring micro-powders.
â­ Shine-absorbing ingredients.
â­ Gentle, skin-friendly formula.

#Maybelline #FitMe #Foundation #Makeup #MatteSkin #FullCoverage #Poreless #Beige #SaudiMakeup #FlawlessBase

description_en:
Experience natural radiance and superior protection with **Maybelline Fit Me Fresh Tint** Foundation SPF 50 with Vitamin C. This foundation offers a radiant look for your skin while evening out its tone, thanks to its formula enriched with Vitamin C and protection from harmful sun rays.

â­ Grants the skin a natural and radiant look.
â­ Protects the skin from harmful sun rays with SPF 50.
â­ Enhances skin's radiance with Vitamin C.
â­ Evens out skin tone and conceals minor imperfections.
â­ A skin-friendly formula that provides a feeling of freshness and hydration all day long.
â­ Available in seven shades to suit different skin tones.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Fresh Tint**

â­ Apply an appropriate amount to clean, dry skin.
â­ Gently blend using fingertips, a makeup sponge, or a foundation brush.
â­ Blend well for a natural, even coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Fresh Tint**

â­ Vitamin C: To enhance radiance and protect the skin.
â­ SPF 50: For superior sun protection.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients: To maintain skin hydration throughout the day.

description_en:
Ink your lips with attitude using Maybelline's **Superstay Matte Ink**, an intense ink color concentration with an ultra-chic matte finish and flawless, 16-hour wear. Discover the perfect pout with **Superstay Matte Ink**, featuring a precise arrow applicator for a smooth, second-skin matte effect in just one stroke. Statement, inked lips that last.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Superstay Matte Ink**:
â­ Apply this lipstick to the center of your upper lip and follow the contours of your mouth.

Achieve a flawless, shine-free complexion with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder**, your go-to compact foundation powder for 12-hour oil control. This powder foundation seamlessly blends into your skin, providing an all-day mattifying look and feel. Its lightweight formula is perfect for hot weather, delivering a natural, poreless, and matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder**:

â­ Oil-controlling foundation powder.

description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Concealer Buff 08**. This multi-use concealer is your ultimate solution for hydrating, concealing, contouring, and correcting in one click. Enjoy up to 12 hours of moisturizing wear and crease-resistant coverage with its easy-to-use sponge applicator. The formula is vegan, non-comedogenic, and formulated without mineral oil, parabens, or talc, making it perfect for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Concealer Buff 08**

â­ Step 1: Twist the sponge applicator in direction of the arrows until the concealer is visible on the sponge.
â­ Step 2: Apply concealer directly to the under-eye area, blending in an outward motion.
â­ Step 3: For extremely dark circles, apply the Neutralizer shade under the concealer shade.
â­ Step 4: For a luminous touch, apply the Brightener shade to the inner corner of the eyes, brow bones, and bridge of the nose.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Concealer Buff 08**

â­ Vegan formula.
â­ Non-comedogenic.
â­ Free of mineral oil.
â­ Free of parabens.
â­ Free of talc.

#Maybelline #Concealer #Makeup #Beauty #SaudiArabia #BeautyHacks #MakeupArtist #Skincare #EyeMakeup #BeautyTips

description_en:
Achieve flawless skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless** Foundation in shade 220 Natural Beige.

This foundation features blurring micro-powders that refine pores while absorbing shine, delivering a natural, matte finish. **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless** is designed to perfectly fit your skin and texture, giving you a poreless-looking complexion.

**Features of Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation:**
â­ 100% Matte finish for a shine-free look.
â­ Blurs pores effectively for a smooth skin appearance.
â­ Adapts to your skin tone for a natural, seamless match.
â­ Absorbs excess oil to control shine all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless**
â­ Apply to clean skin after primer for even distribution and a uniform skin tone.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless**
â­ Contains micro-powders that refine pores and absorb shine.
â­ Its formula is designed to suit various skin types, especially normal to oily skin.

description_en:
Achieve captivating matte lips with **Maybelline Sensational Liquid Matte Lipstick** in its rich, matte shade. Experience a lightweight feeling that moves with you, as if you're wearing no lipstick at all, infused with a moisturizing formula for an ultra-matte look and powder-light texture. This non-sticky, non-cracking, and non-drying formula delivers onestroke color impact. Available in 6 rich shades to suit all skin tones.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Sensational Liquid Matte Lipstick**
â­ Step 1: Apply the matte liquid lipstick in the center of your upper lip and follow the contours of your mouth.
â­ Step 2: Glide the velvet lipstick across the entire bottom lip.
â­ Step 3: Allow product to dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Sensational Liquid Matte Lipstick**
â­ Rich matte color with a lightweight formula.
â­ Moisturizing for lips.
â­ Anti-shine coating.
â­ Non-sticky, non-cracking, and non-drying formula.

description_en:
Achieve flawlessly defined brows that last with the **Maybelline Tattoo Brow 36H Pencil**. This easy-to-use pencil delivers the highest level of pigment to define, fill, and fix uneven eyebrows effortlessly. Get up to 36 hours of impactful brow definition without smudging or fading.

â­ Defines, fills, and fixes uneven eyebrows.
â­ Lasts up to 36 hours.
â­ Smudge-proof and fade-proof.
â­ High-pigment, easy-to-use formula.
â­ Sharpenable tip for precise application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Tattoo Brow 36H Pencil**:
â­ Sharpen pencil tip as desired for more precise application.
â­ Draw small, light strokes along the brow contour.
â­ Use the brush to groom hairs upward and outward to blend color and set brows.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Tattoo Brow 36H Pencil**:
â­ Synthetic Beeswax
â­ Hydrogenated Coconut Oil
â­ Iron Oxides
â­ Titanium Dioxide
â­ Carnauba Wax

description_en:
Experience a revolutionary wear with **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**, where ultimate longwear meets air-light feel for a diffused glow that lasts up to 30 hours. This innovative foundation is 27% lighter than traditional foundations, making it perfect for everyday wear without feeling heavy. It offers buildable full coverage in one swipe, with a transfer-proof, waterproof, and sweatproof formula, ensuring unparalleled staying power all day long. Available in 17 diverse shades, it features a vegan formula, is dermatologist-tested, and non-comedogenic.

Product Features:
â­ Longwear goes light as air
â­ 30H super stay that's transfer-proof, waterproof, sweatproof
â­ New light wear technology for a radiant Lumi-Matte look
â­ Buildable full coverage for a perfect complexion
â­ Vegan and dermatologist-tested formula

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Apply 1-2 pumps to clean, hydrated skin.
â­ Blend with a foundation brush, fingers, or beauty sponge to even out complexion.
â­ If needed, apply more foundation for extra coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**:
â­ Vegan and animal-free ingredient formula.
â­ [Key ingredients to be listed here, e.g., Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Isododecane, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, etc.]

description_en:
Achieve a flawless, shine-free complexion for up to 24 hours with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder Foundation**. This oil-controlling powder foundation provides a smooth, matte finish that lasts all day. Its breathable formula with skin-fitting pigments blends seamlessly for a natural, comfortable feel, perfect for hot weather, and offers sun protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder Foundation**:
â­ Apply to the forehead, nose, cheeks, and chin using the included applicator.
â­ Blend all over using gentle downward strokes for an even, natural finish.
â­ Can be worn alone or on top of foundation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder Foundation**:
â­ Oil-controlling powder.
â­ SPF 44 Sun Protection.
â­ Water-resistant formula.
â­ Skin-fitting pigments.
â­ High coverage and comfortable wear.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Fit Me Fresh Tint**

description_en:
Achieve flawless-looking skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder Foundation**. This oil-controlling powder provides 24-hour shine control and minimizes the appearance of pores for a smooth, matte finish. Its comfortable, breathable formula blends seamlessly into the skin, offering high coverage and a natural, non-cakey look that lasts all day. Perfect for humid weather, it also includes sun protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder Foundation**:
â­ Apply to the forehead, nose, cheeks, and chin using the included applicator or a brush.
â­ Blend all over the face using gentle, downward strokes for a natural, seamless finish.
â­ Can be worn alone or on top of liquid foundation for enhanced coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder Foundation**:
â­ Features SPF 44 for sun protection.
â­ Water-resistant formula with skin-fitting pigments that blend easily.
â­ Available in 6 shades to match various skin tones.

#Maybelline #FitMe #PowderFoundation #FaceMakeup #FullCoverage #MatteMakeup #OilControl #SunProtection #SaudiMakeup #FacePowder

description_en:
Achieve a flawless, long-lasting makeup look with the **Fit Me** Setting Spray from Maybelline New York. This setting spray delivers a maximum matte finish, ensuring your foundation, powder, eyeshadow, and brows stay in place for up to 24 hours. Say goodbye to faded or melted makeup and hello to impeccable staying power.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Fit Me**:
â­ Step 1: Shake the bottle well.
â­ Step 2: Hold 8-10" away from your face and ensure your eyes are closed.
â­ Step 3: Spray 4-6 times around your face for ultimate setting.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Fit Me**:
â­ 24-hour long-lasting formula.
â­ Maximum matte finish.
â­ Keeps all makeup in place.

#Maybelline #FitMe #SettingSpray #LongLastingMakeup #MatteFinish #SaudiBeauty #MakeupEssentials #BeautyHacks #Cosmetics #FlawlessLook

description_en:
Introducing **Maybelline Concealer Instant Age Rewind**, the do-it-all concealer that moisturizes too! This multi-use concealer hydrates, conceals, contours, and corrects in a click! Get up to 12 hours of moisturizing wear for crease-resistant coverage and a unique sponge tip applicator.

**Maybelline Concealer Instant Age Rewind** is vegan, non-comedogenic, and formulated without mineral oil, parabens, or talc, making it perfect for your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Concealer Instant Age Rewind**
â­ Step 1: Twist the sponge applicator in the direction of the arrows until the concealer is visible on the sponge.
â­ Step 2: Apply concealer directly to the under-eye area, blending in an outward motion.
â­ Step 3: For extremely dark circles, apply the Neutralizer shade under the concealer shade.
â­ Step 4: For a luminous touch, apply the Brightener shade to the inner corner of the eyes, brow bones, and bridge of the nose.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Concealer Instant Age Rewind**
â­ Vegan Formula.
â­ Non-Comedogenic.
â­ Free from Mineral Oil.
â­ Free from Parabens.
â­ Free from Talc.

#Maybelline #Concealer #MaybellineKSA #EyeMakeup #UndereyeConcealer #SaudiMakeup #InstantAgeRewind #FullCoverage #ProMakeup #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Achieve a flawless, natural matte finish with **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless**. Discover the upgraded Maybelline New York formula for extended oil control, now with SPF 22 and 16-Hour Oil Control for a perfect, natural matte finish that lasts all day. description_en:
Discover lasting radiance with **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**, a feather-light formula that delivers up to 30 hours of wear with a luminous matte finish. This full-coverage, buildable foundation offers an unparalleled weightless feel thanks to its light wear technology. Achieve a flawless, even complexion that's transfer-proof, waterproof, and sweatproof. This vegan formula is dermatologist-tested for ultimate safety and comfort, available in 17 shades to suit every skin tone.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Apply 1-2 pumps to clean, hydrated skin.
â­ Blend with a foundation brush, fingers, or beauty sponge for an even complexion.
â­ If needed, apply more foundation for extra coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**:
â­ Certified Vegan Formula.
â­ Dermatologist Tested.
â­ Allergy Tested.
â­ Non-comedogenic.

Discover Maybelline New York's next-level lip gloss: **Maybelline Lifter Gloss with Hyaluronic Acid 06 REEF**. Hydrated, fuller-looking lips with just one swipe. This breakthrough formula with Hyaluronic Acid visibly smooths lip surface and enhances lip contour with high shine for hydrated, fuller-looking lips in an easy, one-swipe application. The hydrating lip gloss is available in a full range of modern shades.

â­ Hydrated, and natural fuller-looking lips.
â­ Breakthrough formula with Hyaluronic Acid, smoothens and hydrates lips.
â­ XL size wand enhances lip contour in one swipe.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lifter Gloss with Hyaluronic Acid 06 REEF**
â­ For best results, apply the lip gloss to the center of your upper lip and follow the contours of your mouth.
â­ Glide the lip gloss applicator across the entire bottom lip.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lifter Gloss with Hyaluronic Acid 06 REEF**
â­ Contains Hyaluronic Acid for lip hydration and smoothing.

description_en:
Discover the power of the new and improved **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless SPF 22**! Enjoy shine-free skin with a formula that controls oil for up to 16 hours, giving you a natural matte finish that lasts all day. With SPF 22, it protects your skin from sun damage. Its innovative formula with blurring micro-powders works to hide pores and reduce shine, leaving your skin with a smooth and flawless look. Ideal for normal to oily skin, and available in 24 shades to suit all skin tones. Experience the natural look you've always dreamed of with **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless SPF 22**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless SPF 22**

â­ Apply an adequate amount to your skin after using primer to even out skin tone and achieve the best coverage.
â­ Blend the product using a foundation brush or sponge for a natural result.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless SPF 22**

â­ Advanced formula with 16-hour oil control.
â­ SPF 22 for added sun protection.
â­ Blurring micro-powders that hide pores and reduce shine.
â­ Provides a natural matte finish.
â­ Available in 24 diverse shades.

#Maybelline #FitMe #Foundation #RiyadhMakeup #FullCoverage #HealthySkin #BridalMakeup #MakeupDeals #DailyMakeup #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Discover the upgraded Maybelline New York formula! **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless SPF 111** delivers a long-lasting natural matte finish with superior 16-hour oil control. Enhanced with SPF22, this innovative formula blurs pores and absorbs shine for a perfect, matte complexion. Specifically designed for normal to oily skin, it provides a smooth, buildable coverage. Now presented in a premium glass bottle with a pump for effortless and precise application, available in 24 tone-fitting shades to match every skin tone.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless SPF 111**

â­ Apply to clean skin after using a primer.
â­ Use your fingertips, a sponge, or a brush to blend the foundation evenly across your face.
â­ Blend well for a flawless, seamless finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless SPF 111**

â­ Advanced oil-controlling formula.
â­ Blurring micro powders to refine pores.
â­ SPF22 sunscreen.
â­ Oil-free.
â­ Suitable for normal to oily skin.

description_en:
Achieve a flawless complexion with **Maybelline Fit Me Liquid Foundation 100 Warm - Ivory**. Designed for normal to oily skin, this foundation features blurring micro-powders that refine pores while absorbing excess shine for a natural, matte finish. **Maybelline Fit Me Liquid Foundation 100 Warm - Ivory** blends seamlessly into your skin, providing a natural look with visibly reduced pores and a shine-free appearance throughout the day.

â­ Lightweight formula that blends effortlessly into your skin.
â­ Buildable coverage to achieve your desired look.
â­ Blurs pores for a smoother, more refined complexion.
â­ Absorbs excess oil to control shine and maintain a matte finish.
â­ Leaves skin feeling soft, smooth, and natural.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Liquid Foundation 100 Warm - Ivory**
â­ Apply a small amount to your fingertips, a sponge, or a foundation brush.
â­ Start applying from the center of your face and blend outwards.
â­ Blend thoroughly to ensure an even tone and no visible lines.
â­ Best used after primer for optimal results and a unified skin tone.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Liquid Foundation 100 Warm - Ivory**
â­ Oil-free formula.
â­ Blurring micro-powders to absorb shine.
â­ Pore-refining ingredients.

#Maybelline #FitMeFoundation #MatteSkin #Poreless #FoundationMakeup #BeautySaudi #MakeupSaudi #FlawlessSkin #OilySkin #BeautyProducts

description_en:
Start your day with a natural glow using **Maybelline New York Fit Me Fresh Tint**. This lightweight foundation, infused with Vitamin C and SPF 50, evens out your skin tone and protects against dark spots. Its skin-friendly formula glides on easily, leaving a natural, fresh finish that keeps your skin looking healthy and moisturized all day. Enhance your beauty with a refreshed, bright look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Fit Me Fresh Tint**:

â­ Apply daily to even out skin tone and protect your skin.
â­ Blend with fingertips, sponge, or brush for seamless coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Fit Me Fresh Tint**:

â­ Vitamin C: Brightens skin and helps reduce the appearance of dark spots.
â­ SPF 50: Provides high protection against harmful sun rays.
â­ Moisturizing Formula: Delivers continuous hydration to the skin.

description_en:
The **Maybelline New York, Super Stay Matte Ink 135 Globetrotter** liquid lipstick gives you a long-lasting flawless matte finish in a range of new super pigmented shades. The **Maybelline New York, Super Stay Matte Ink 135 Globetrotter** features gorgeous, matte lip color that lasts all day, no matter how many bites, sips or kisses you throw its way!

â­ Available in a range of super saturated shades.
â­ Super Stay Matte Ink features a unique arrow applicator for precise application.
â­ Lasts up to 16 hours, Matte.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York, Super Stay Matte Ink 135 Globetrotter**:
1. CHOOSE YOUR SHADE: Achieving the ultimate matte pout is simple when you have the perfect liquid matte lipstick.
2. GET PRECISE: Trace your cupidâ€™s bow with the applicator.
3. MIRROR & SHADE: Mirror this application on the other half of the top lip, shading in evenly.
4. BOTTOMS UP: As you get closer to the lip contours, use the tip of the precision applicator for controlled, sharp application along the lip edge.
5. MATTE PERFECTION: Let sit for a few minutes to dry matte. Now youâ€™re ready to go with high-intensity color and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York, Super Stay Matte Ink 135 Globetrotter**:
* Matte Liquid Formula
* High-Intensity Color Pigments
* Moisturizing Ingredients for Lip Comfort

description_en:
Achieve stunning, flawless matte lips with **Maybelline New York Super Stay Matte Ink** in shade Self-starter 130. This liquid lipstick boasts a super-pigmented formula that delivers intense color with a comfortable, never-creasing matte finish that lasts up to 16 hours. Perfect for every occasion, this waterproof lipstick stays put, no matter how many bites, sips, or kisses you throw its way. Experience ultimate comfort and long-lasting color with **Maybelline New York Super Stay Matte Ink**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Super Stay Matte Ink**:
â­ Choose your perfect shade for the ultimate matte pout.
â­ Use the precision applicator to trace your cupid's bow accurately.
â­ Apply evenly to the top lip, then to the bottom lip.
â­ Use the tip of the precision applicator for a sharp application along the lip edge.
â­ Let the lipstick sit for a few minutes to dry matte for a perfect finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Super Stay Matte Ink**:
â­ Matte liquid formula.
â­ Rich, saturated shades.
â­ Precision applicator.
â­ Lasts up to 16 hours.
â­ Waterproof.

Unleash your perfect pout with **Maybelline New York | Superstay Matte Ink 118 Dancer - Red**. This liquid lipstick delivers a long-lasting, flawless matte finish in a range of super pigmented shades, perfect for any occasion. Its waterproof formula ensures your color stays put through every bite, sip, and kiss. The unique arrow applicator allows for precise application, defining your lips with intense color and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York | Superstay Matte Ink 118 Dancer - Red**:

â­ Trace your cupid's bow with the applicator for precise definition.
â­ Apply evenly to the upper lip, then to the bottom lip, using the precision tip to contour the lip edge.
â­ Allow to dry for a few minutes for a perfect matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York | Superstay Matte Ink 118 Dancer - Red**:
â­ Long-lasting flawless matte finish.
â­ Waterproof formula that lasts up to 16 hours.
â­ Unique arrow applicator for precise application.
â­ Available in a range of rich and varied shades.
