description_en:
Achieve a naturally radiant and fresh look with **Maybelline Fit Me Fresh Tint Foundation**. This innovative formula is infused with Vitamin C to instantly brighten and even out your skin tone, while providing superior sun protection with SPF 50. Enjoy a perfect coverage that gives your skin a natural, luminous appearance all day long, while keeping it moisturized and protected from dark spots.

â­ Enriched with Vitamin C for brighter, even-toned, and protected skin.
â­ SPF 50 offers comprehensive protection against UVA and UVB rays.
â­ Lightweight, perfect coverage for daily use for a natural look.
â­ Moisturizes skin and protects against the appearance of dark spots.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Fresh Tint Foundation**:
â­ Apply daily to your skin to even out skin tone and protect it.
â­ Blend with fingertips, sponge, or brush for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Fresh Tint Foundation**:
â­ Contains Vitamin C, known for its brightening and antioxidant properties.
â­ SPF 50 for skin protection from UVA and UVB rays.
â­ Gentle, skin-friendly formula for all-day comfort.

#Maybelline #FitMe #Foundation #Makeup #Beauty #RadiantSkin #VitaminC #SunProtection #SaudiArabia #Fashion

description_en:
Achieve a flawless matte complexion with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder**. This unique powder foundation offers 12-hour oil control, blending seamlessly into your skin for an all-day mattifying look and feel. Perfect for hot weather, it provides a natural, poreless matte finish that looks effortlessly beautiful. With added SPF 28 protection, **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder** is your go-to for a perfect complexion. Discover the secret to radiant skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder**:
â­ Apply the powder to your face using the included sponge or a brush.
â­ Use a downward motion when applying to avoid making fine hairs more visible.
â­ For fuller coverage, blend gently for a natural look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder**:
â­ Talc
â­ Titanium Dioxide
â­ Silica
â­ Mineral Oil
â­ Fragrance
â­ And other ingredients to ensure unparalleled wear and comfort.

#MaybellineFitMe #PowderFoundation #FaceMakeup #MatteAndPoreless #FoundationPowder #SaudiMakeup #MatteSkin #MaybellineProducts #DailyMakeup #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Introducing the new next-level lip gloss from Maybelline New York: **Maybelline Lifter Gloss** with Hyaluronic Acid. Achieve hydrated lips and a fuller look with this breakthrough formula. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid, **Maybelline Lifter Gloss** visibly smooths lip surface and enhances lip contour with high shine for hydrated, fuller-looking lips in an easy, one-swipe application. This hydrating lip gloss is available in a full range of modern shades.

â­ Hydrated, and naturally fuller-looking lips.
â­ Breakthrough formula with Hyaluronic Acid, smoothes and hydrates lips.
â­ XL size wand enhances lip contour in one swipe.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lifter Gloss**:
â­ Apply the lip gloss to the center of your upper lip, following the contours of your mouth.
â­ Glide the lip gloss applicator across the entire bottom lip for a perfectly polished finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lifter Gloss**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid for intense hydration and lip plumping.
â­ High-shine formula that provides a fuller, captivating lip appearance.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients to maintain soft, supple lips.

#Maybelline #LipGloss #Makeup #FullerLips #Beauty #HyaluronicAcid #LipHydration #SaudiMakeup #Skincare #SaudiLips

description_en:
Meet the **Maybelline New York Tattoo Brow 3-Day Styling Gel**, your ultimate solution for effortless application and natural-looking brows that wow! This semi-permanent waterproof tinted eyebrow gel is your go-to for mistake-proof, smudge-proof, and climate-proof results that last. The unique two-way mini brush delivers an effortless application, easily defining and shaping your brows for a perfectly sculpted look. Achieve a natural makeup look that lasts for up to 3 days with this groundbreaking tinted eyebrow gel. It's easier than ever to get beautifully filled and defined brows. Available in 3 stunning shades.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Tattoo Brow 3-Day Styling Gel**:
â­ For best results, hold a brush against the brow and repeatedly extend from root to tip for even coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Tattoo Brow 3-Day Styling Gel**:
â­ Waterproof tinted gel
â­ Smudge-proof, sweat-proof, and climate-proof
â­ Two-way mini brush for easy application
â­ Lasts up to 3 days
â­ Available in 3 shades

Achieve beautiful, fuller-looking brows for up to 3 days with this incredible formula, available in 3 versatile shades.

description_en:
Achieve a naturally radiant look with **Maybelline New York Fit Me Fresh Tint**. This lightweight tint, infused with Vitamin C and SPF 50, works to even out skin tone and protect it from environmental aggressors, giving you a healthy and luminous complexion. Its skin-friendly formula glides on effortlessly, leaving a natural, fresh finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Fit Me Fresh Tint**:
â­ Apply to your skin daily to even out skin tone and protect your skin.
â­ Blend with fingertips, a sponge, or a brush for a natural coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Fit Me Fresh Tint**:
â­ Vitamin C: To brighten skin and protect against dark spots.
â­ SPF 50: To provide high protection against harmful sun rays.
â­ Moisturizing Formula: To keep skin hydrated all day.

description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Porless SPF 312**. Achieve a long-lasting, natural matte finish with its innovative formula that controls oil for up to 16 hours. Featuring SPF22 for added protection, it effectively blurs pores, reduces shine, and provides a seamless look. **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Porless SPF 312** is specifically designed for normal to oily skin and now comes in a sleek glass bottle with a pump for effortless application, available in 24 tone-fitting shades to match every skin tone.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Porless SPF 312**
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to your skin after using a primer.
â­ Blend evenly across the entire face to even out skin tone and conceal imperfections.
â­ Use your fingers, a sponge, or a brush for the perfect coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Porless SPF 312**
â­ Advanced 16-hour oil control formula.
â­ Fine micro-powders that blur pores and absorb shine.
â­ Contains SPF22 sunscreen.
â­ Provides a natural, matte finish.
â­ Ideal for normal to oily skin.

description_en:
Discover the secret to radiant, healthy-looking skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Fresh Tint**! This innovative product combines advanced makeup benefits with superior skincare, giving you a fresh, natural look that lasts all day. Enriched with Vitamin C and SPF 50, **Maybelline Fit Me Fresh Tint** brightens and protects your skin from harmful sun rays, while providing lightweight coverage and a soft matte finish. Achieve skin that looks and feels refreshed with every application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Fresh Tint**:
â­ Step 1: Begin by applying **Maybelline Fit Me Fresh Tint** to a clean, dry face.
â­ Step 2: Use your fingertips or a foundation brush to evenly spread the skin tint across your face for ultimate natural coverage and skincare benefits.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Fresh Tint**:
â­ Enriched with Vitamin C for skin brightening and radiance.
â­ Offers high sun protection with SPF 50.
â­ Lightweight formula for natural coverage.
â­ Provides a soft matte finish.

#MaybellineKSA #FitMe #Foundation #SkinTint #SkincareMakeup #VitaminC #SunProtection #NaturalLook #RadiantSkin #DailyMakeup

description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation**.

Maybelline New York presents an upgraded formula for a long-lasting natural, matte look, featuring superior 16-hour oil control. With SPF22, it protects your skin from harmful sun rays. **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation** is specifically designed for normal to oily skin, with micro-blurring powders that refine pores and absorb shine, leaving you with a smooth, even-toned complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to your skin after using primer.
â­ Blend evenly to even out your skin tone for a perfect finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation**:
â­ Advanced oil-control formula.
â­ SPF22 sun protection.
â­ Micro-blurring powders to refine pores and reduce shine.
â­ Available in 24 skin-fitting shades.

#Maybelline #FitMe #Foundation #Makeup #SaudiMakeup #HealthySkin #DailyMakeup #FullCoverage #MatteFinish #NaturalLook

description_en:
Achieve perfectly sculpted, long-lasting brows with the **Maybelline Tattoo Brow 36H Pencil**. This highly pigmented, easy-to-use pencil defines, fills, and fixes uneven eyebrows, delivering up to 36 hours of impact without smudging or fading.

â­ Up to 36H brow impact.
â­ Defines, fills, and fixes brows.
â­ Smudge-proof and fade-proof.
â­ Sharpenable tip for precise application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Tattoo Brow 36H Pencil**:
â­ Sharpen pencil tip as desired for more precise application.
â­ Draw small, light strokes along the brow contour.
â­ Use the brush to groom hairs upward and outward to blend color and set brows.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Tattoo Brow 36H Pencil**:
â­ Ricinus Communis Seed Oil
â­ Cocos Nucifera Oil
â­ Copernicia Cerifera Cera
â­ Tocopherol

description_en:
Achieve perfectly defined eyebrows with unparalleled precision using the **Maybelline New York Brow Ultra Slim 03 Warm Brown**. This pencil is designed to give you ultra-precise, hair-like strokes for a naturally defined look. Its smooth, break-resistant formula features an ultra-slim 1.5mm tip and a built-in spoolie brush for easy grooming and shaping. Available in six shades to complement all skin tones. â­ Ultra-precise, hair-like strokes.
â­ Smooth and break-resistant formula.
â­ Ultra-slim 1.5mm precision tip.
â­ Built-in spoolie brush for grooming and shaping.
â­ Delivers long-lasting, defined, natural-looking brows.
â­ Available in six versatile shades.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Brow Ultra Slim 03 Warm Brown**
Step 1: Draw small, light strokes along the brow contour.
Step 2: Use the built-in brush to groom hairs upward and outward.

description_en:
Achieve a radiant bronze look with the **Maybelline New York Master Bronze Color & Highlighting Kit**. These universal bronzer and highlight shades can be mixed together or worn alone to create a head-turning, sun-kissed look.

âœ¨ Benefits:
â­ Go beyond the highlight for vibrant and dimensional statement cheeks.
â­ **Maybelline New York Master Bronze Color & Highlighting Kit** allows you to blush your own way.
â­ Use each shade alone or mix and match to create a custom cheek color.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Master Bronze Color & Highlighting Kit**:
â­ Sweep Bronzer all over the face and blend.
â­ Add Highlighter to the top of the cheeks and blend for a perfect glow.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Master Bronze Color & Highlighting Kit**:
â­ Blendable, soft powder formula.
â­ Universal bronzer and highlighter shades.

title_ar: Ø¨Ø§Ù„ÙŠØª Ø¸Ù„Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹ÙŠÙˆÙ† Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ¨ÙŠÙ„ÙŠÙ† Ø¨Ø§Ø± - Ø¨Ø±ØºØ§Ù†Ø¯ÙŠ | Maybelline Bar Palette - Burgundy
description_en:
Unlock ultimate allure with the **Maybelline Bar Palette - Burgundy**. This luxurious palette offers 12 rich, blendable shades, expertly designed to enhance your eyes and add a captivating touch to your look. Whether you're prepping for a party or seeking a sophisticated everyday glow, its stunning and diverse colors allow you to create endless looks, from classic matte to dazzling shimmers. Achieve a professional finish with the smooth formula that ensures even application and a magical final touch. The **Maybelline Bar Palette - Burgundy** is your key to radiant eye makeup that reflects your unique personality.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Bar Palette - Burgundy**:
â­ Step 1: Apply a light shade to the entire eyelid up to the brow bone.
â­ Step 2: Use a medium shade and blend it over the eyelid.
â­ Step 3: Apply the same shade or a slightly darker one to contour the crease-line of the eye.
â­ Step 4: Choose a dark shade to emphasize the eye by lining the upper and lower lash line.
â­ Step 5: Finally, use a light shimmery shade to highlight the inner corners of the eyes and the brow bone.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Bar Palette - Burgundy**:
â­ High-quality pressed powder.
â­ Rich pigments for long-lasting color payoff.
â­ Blendable ingredients for easy application.
â­ Smooth formula for a silky-smooth finish.
â­ A variety of shades to create versatile looks.

#MaybellineNY #EyeshadowPalette #BurgundyMakeup #SaudiBeauty #MakeupSaudi #MaybellineSaudi #EyeMakeup #BeautyEssentials #Cosmetics #MakeupGoals

title_en: Maybelline Lifter Gloss with Hyaluronic Acid 07 AMBER - Hydrated & Fuller Lips
title_ar: Ù…ÙŠØ¨ÙŠÙ„ÙŠÙ† Ù…Ù„Ù…Ø¹ Ø§Ù„Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ù„ÙŠÙØªØ± Ø¬Ù„ÙˆØ³ Ù…Ø¹ Ù‡ÙŠØ§Ù„ÙˆØ±ÙˆÙ†Ùƒ Ø£Ø³ÙŠØ¯ 07 Ø§Ù‘Ù…Ø¨Ø± - Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ø±Ø·Ø¨Ø© ÙˆÙ…Ù…ØªÙ„Ø¦Ø©
description_en:
Meet the new next level lip gloss from Maybelline New York: **Maybelline Lifter Gloss with Hyaluronic Acid** for luxuriously hydrated and fuller-looking lips. This breakthrough formula visibly smoothes lip surface and enhances lip contour with high shine for a captivating look in an easy, one-swipe application. Experience hydrated, naturally fuller-looking lips.

â­ Hydrated, and natural fuller-looking lips.
â­ Breakthrough formula with Hyaluronic Acid, visibly smoothes and hydrates lips.
â­ XL size wand enhances lip contour in one swipe.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lifter Gloss with Hyaluronic Acid**:
â­ For best results, apply lip gloss to the center of your upper lip.
â­ Start from the center to the outer edges of your lip, following your mouth's contours.
â­ Glide the lip gloss applicator across the entire bottom lip.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lifter Gloss with Hyaluronic Acid**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid for deep hydration.
â­ Smoothing formula for a refined lip surface.
â­ High shine for fuller, more alluring lips.

#Maybelline #LifterGloss #LipGloss #HyaluronicAcid #SaudiBeauty #MakeupKSA #HydratedLips #FullerLips #MaybellineNewYork #RiyadhMakeup

description_en:
Achieve flawless-looking skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder Foundation**. This foundation powder offers 24-hour oil control and a matte finish, minimizing shine and reducing oil for a smooth, natural look that lasts all day. Its comfortable, breathable formula blends seamlessly into the skin for high coverage and a poreless appearance, perfect for any weather. Enjoy a fresh, shine-free complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder Foundation**:
â­ Using the included applicator, apply to the forehead, nose, cheeks, and chin.
â­ Blend all over using gentle downward strokes.
â­ Can be worn alone or on top of foundation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder Foundation**:
â­ Foundation powder with SPF.
â­ Water-resistant formula.
â­ Skin-fitting pigments.
â­ Controls shine and oil.

#Maybelline #FitMe #PowderFoundation #FaceMakeup #MatteSkin #SaudiMakeup #PressedPowder #DailyMakeup #Skincare #FullCoverage

description_en:
Discover the upgraded Maybelline New York **Fit Me Matte & Poreless** foundation, now with enhanced 16-hour oil control and SPF 22. Achieve a perfect natural matte finish that lasts all day for flawlessly smooth skin. **Fit Me Matte & Poreless** features blurring micro-powders that refine pores and absorb shine, giving you a natural, poreless-looking complexion. Designed for normal to oily skin, it's available in 24 skin-fitting shades for the perfect match.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Fit Me Matte & Poreless**
â­ Apply a small amount onto your skin after using a primer.
â­ Blend evenly using your fingertips, a foundation brush, or a sponge.
â­ Blend well for a uniform coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Fit Me Matte & Poreless**
â­ Advanced formula with micro-powders for oil absorption.
â­ SPF 22 sun protection.
â­ Provides 16-hour oil control.
â­ Suitable for normal to oily skin.
â­ Delivers a natural, matte finish.

#Maybelline #FitMe #Foundation #Makeup #MatteSkin #OilySkin #SaudiMakeup #RiyadhBeauty #JeddahFashion #BeautySaudi

description_en:
Achieve intense, captivating matte lips with **Maybelline New York Sensational Liquid Matte Lipstick**. This liquid matte lipstick boasts a lightweight feel and a moisturizing formula, enhanced with an anti-shine coating for an ultra-matte finish. It delivers rich, one-stroke color impact with a powder-light texture, offering comfortable wear that moves with your lips as if you're not wearing any lipstick at all. Its non-sticky, non-cracking, and non-drying formula ensures lasting comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Sensational Liquid Matte Lipstick**:
â­ Step 1: Apply the matte liquid lipstick in the center of your upper lip and follow the contours of your mouth with the precise tip.
â­ Step 2: Use the wider side of the applicator to fill in the lips.
â­ Step 3: Allow product to dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Sensational Liquid Matte Lipstick**:
â­ Rich matte color.
â­ Lightweight texture.
â­ Moisturizing for lips.
â­ Soft, powdery feel.
â­ Non-sticky, non-cracking, non-drying formula.

#Maybelline #Lipstick #LipMakeup #MatteLips #NewYork #MaybellineNY #SaudiMakeup #GlamLips #LiquidMatte #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Achieve a natural, radiant look with **Maybelline Fit Me Fresh Tint Foundation**. This innovative formula is infused with Vitamin C and superior SPF 50 sun protection to brighten, even out skin tone, and shield against dark spots. It offers lightweight, perfect coverage for everyday use, leaving you with a glowing, healthy complexion all day long. Enjoy skin that's unified, protected, and vibrant with **Maybelline Fit Me Fresh Tint Foundation**.

â­ Brightens and revitalizes skin with Vitamin C.
â­ Provides high sun protection with SPF 50.
â­ Effectively evens out and unifies skin tone.
â­ Lightweight, comfortable formula for daily wear.
â­ Protects skin from dark spots and leaves it moisturized.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Fresh Tint Foundation**
â­ Apply daily to your skin to even out skin tone and protect it.
â­ Blend with fingertips, sponge, or brush for seamless coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Fresh Tint Foundation**
â­ Enriched with Vitamin C for skin brightening.
â­ Contains SPF 50 for sun protection.
â­ Skin-friendly formula.

description_en:
Achieve flawless skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Foundation 334 - Beige**. This foundation is designed for normal to oily skin, featuring blurring micro powders that refine pores while absorbing shine for a natural matte finish. **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Foundation 334 - Beige** seamlessly blends with your skin and texture, providing a natural look and poreless-looking skin.

Product Features:
â­ 100% Matte finish.
â­ Blurs pores for a smooth appearance.
â­ Fits your skin tone and texture perfectly.
â­ Absorbs shine, controlling oil for a fresh look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Foundation 334 - Beige**
â­ Apply to your skin after primer to even out your complexion and achieve the best coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Foundation 334 - Beige**
â­ Contains blurring micro powders that refine pores and absorb shine.
â­ Formula specifically designed for normal to oily skin.

description_en:
Achieve flawless skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Ultmt Twc Spf 123 - Beige**. This innovative powder foundation offers 24-hour oil control and a matte, poreless finish. Its lightweight, breathable formula blends seamlessly into the skin for high coverage and a natural look that lasts all day, making it perfect for hot weather. It also provides sun protection with SPF 44.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Ultmt Twc Spf 123 - Beige**:
â­ Using the included applicator, apply to the forehead, nose, cheeks, and chin.
â­ Blend all over the face using gentle downward strokes.
â­ Can be worn alone or on top of foundation for added coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Ultmt Twc Spf 123 - Beige**:
â­ Features skin-fitting pigments that blend easily.
â­ SPF 44 for sun protection.
â­ Water-resistant formula.
â­ Oil-controlling and mattifying properties.

description_en:
Product Name: **Maybelline Master Strobing Liquid Highlighter - Light Shade**

Discover the illuminating strobe effect with **Maybelline Master Strobing Liquid Highlighter - Light Shade**. This liquid highlighter features a micro-pearl formula designed to deliver all-over radiance, creating a look of skin that appears as if lit from within. Perfect for enhancing your facial features and adding a luminous glow to your complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Master Strobing Liquid Highlighter - Light Shade**
â­ Step 1: Apply the highlighter using a brush or fingertips.
â­ Step 2: Target areas like the cheekbones, brow bone, and bridge of the nose.
â­ Step 3: Blend gently for a seamless, radiant finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Master Strobing Liquid Highlighter - Light Shade**
â­ Enriched with micro-pearls for an illuminating effect.
â­ Lightweight liquid formula for easy application.
â­ Blends effortlessly into the skin.

#Maybelline #Highlighter #FaceMakeup #Glow #SaudiMakeup #RadiantSkin #ProMakeup #Cosmetics #Beauty #Skincare

description_en:
Achieve a flawless matte complexion with **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless SPF 332**. Discover the upgraded Maybelline New York formula designed for extended 16-hour oil control and an SPF22 sun protection factor. This foundation provides a perfect natural matte finish that lasts all day, thanks to its blurring micro powders that refine pores and absorb shine. It's ideal for normal to oily skin, offering a smooth, poreless-looking finish and a natural look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless SPF 332**
â­ Apply to your skin after using primer to even out your skin tone for a perfect complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Foundation Matte & Poreless SPF 332**
â­ Advanced formula for natural matte coverage.
â­ Contains micro-powders to minimize the appearance of pores.
â­ SPF22 for added sun protection.
â­ 16-hour oil control formula.
â­ Available in 24 tone-fitting shades.

#Maybelline #FitMe #MattePoreless #Foundation #SaudiMakeup #OilySkin #MatteSkin #NaturalFinish #RiyadhBeauty #KSAFashion

Discover the ultimate natural matte look with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless** Foundation! Now upgraded with 16-Hour Oil Control and SPF22, **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless** refines pores and absorbs shine for a flawless, natural matte finish that lasts all day. Available in 24 skin-fitting shades and a premium glass bottle with a pump for effortless application. Perfect for normal to oily skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless**

â­ SPF22 sun protection.
â­ Available in 24 natural shades.

description_en:
Give your lips the hydration and fullness they deserve with **Maybelline Lifter Gloss with Hyaluronic Acid 01 PEARL**. This breakthrough gloss from Maybelline New York, infused with Hyaluronic Acid, visibly smooths the lip surface and enhances lip contour with high shine for hydrated, fuller-looking lips in an easy, one-swipe application.

â­ Hydrated, and natural fuller-looking lips.
â­ Breakthrough formula with Hyaluronic Acid, visibly smoothes and hydrates lips.
â­ XL size wand enhances lip contour in one swipe.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lifter Gloss with Hyaluronic Acid 01 PEARL**:
â­ Apply to the center of your upper lip and follow the contours of your mouth.
â­ Glide the gloss applicator across the entire bottom lip for a seamless finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lifter Gloss with Hyaluronic Acid 01 PEARL**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid for deep hydration and plumping effect.
â­ High-shine formula for enhanced lip appearance.
â­ Nourishing ingredients for lip care.

#MaybellineNY #LifterGloss #LipGloss #HyaluronicAcid #LipMakeup #FullerLips #LipHydration #LipBeauty #SaudiMakeup #LipCare

description_en:
Define your eyes with **Maybelline New York Eye Studio Lasting Drama Gel Eyeliner** in intense black. This oil-free, waterproof gel eyeliner delivers rich, concentrated pigments for a dramatic look that lasts up to 24 hours. It comes with a dual-ended brush for easy and precise application, making it safe for sensitive eyes and ophthalmologist-tested. It's also contact lens safe and perfect for creating the most intense line for lasting drama.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Eye Studio Lasting Drama Gel Eyeliner**:
â­ For a defined look: In small strokes, glide the liner across the lash line from the inner to the outer corner of the eye.
â­ For a dramatic look: Enhance and thicken the line from the outer corner upwards towards the brow to wing out for extra drama.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Eye Studio Lasting Drama Gel Eyeliner**:
â­ Clear gel base with concentrated pigments.
â­ Oil-free formula.
â­ Smudge and water-resistant.
â­ Intense pigments.

#Maybelline #Eyeliner #EyeMakeup #SaudiMakeup #Kohl #EyeLiner #Black #Beauty #ProMakeup #Lashes

description_en:
Achieve flawless skin with **Maybelline New York Superstay Full Coverage Concealer 15 Light-Beige**. This high-coverage concealer glides onto the skin for a seamless, even finish, instantly transforming tired-looking eyes. Its waterproof, transfer-proof, and smudge-resistant formula lasts for up to 24 hours, making it your go-to for wiping out dark circles and imperfections.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Superstay Full Coverage Concealer 15 Light-Beige**:
â­ Using the paddle applicator, apply the desired amount under your eyes or on blemishes.
â­ Blend with your fingertips for a seamless, natural finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Superstay Full Coverage Concealer 15 Light-Beige**:
â­ Full-coverage formula for a perfect complexion.
â­ Waterproof, transfer-proof, and smudge-resistant for long-lasting wear.
â­ Brightens and revitalizes the under-eye area.
â­ Effectively conceals dark circles and imperfections.
